snippet: The police released few details, aside from saying the school was Wave Preparatory Elementary in Far Rockaway and the weapon was a handgun.
abstract: Handgun is found in the backpack of a 7-year-old student at Wave Preparatory Elementary School in Far Rockaway, leading to a tense few hours as the school is placed on lockdown while the police make sure there is no danger.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and CHRISTOPHER MAAG
byline.contributor: Marc Santora and Jack Styczynski contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The police released few details, aside from saying the school was Wave Preparatory Elementary in Far Rockaway and the weapon was a handgun.

headline.seo: Gun Found in Child’s Backpack at Queens Elementary School
